data.name: ReadCashReceiptDetailBalanceAdj1
data.value: select top(1) CRD_IDENTIFIER, CRV_IDENTIFIER, CST_IDENTIFIER, CRT_IDENTIFIER, CRD_S_IDENTIFIER, CRV_S_IDENTIFIER, CST_S_IDENTIFIER, CRT_S_IDENTIFIER, CRN_IDENTIFIER, CREATED_TIMESTAMP from CKT_CRDTL_BAL_ADJ with(readuncommitted) where (@crdIdentifier = CRD_IDENTIFIER) and (@crvIdentifier = CRV_IDENTIFIER) and (@cstIdentifier = CST_IDENTIFIER) and (@crtIdentifier = CRT_IDENTIFIER)

data.name: ReadCashReceiptDetailBalanceAdj2
data.value: select top(1) CRD_IDENTIFIER, CRV_IDENTIFIER, CST_IDENTIFIER, CRT_IDENTIFIER, CRD_S_IDENTIFIER, CRV_S_IDENTIFIER, CST_S_IDENTIFIER, CRT_S_IDENTIFIER, CRN_IDENTIFIER, CREATED_TIMESTAMP from CKT_CRDTL_BAL_ADJ with(readuncommitted) where (@crdSIdentifier = CRD_S_IDENTIFIER) and (@crvSIdentifier = CRV_S_IDENTIFIER) and (@cstSIdentifier = CST_S_IDENTIFIER) and (@crtSIdentifier = CRT_S_IDENTIFIER)

data.name: ReadCashReceiptType
data.value: select CRTYPE_ID, CATEGORY_IND from CKT_CR_TYPE order by CRTYPE_ID

data.name: ReadCollection
data.value: select top(1) COLL_ID, ADJ_IND, CRT_TYPE, CST_ID, CRV_ID, CRD_ID, OBG_ID, CSP_NUMBER, CPA_TYPE, OTR_ID, OTR_TYPE, OTY_ID, COLL_ADJ_DT from CKT_COLLECTION with(readuncommitted) where (@crdId = CRD_ID) and (@crvId = CRV_ID) and (@cstId = CST_ID) and (@crtType = CRT_TYPE) and (ADJ_IND = 'Y')

data.name: ReadCollectionCashReceiptDetailCashReceiptEvent
data.value: select T1.COLL_ID, T1.APPLIED_TO_CD, T1.COLL_DT, T1.ADJ_IND, T1.CRT_TYPE, T1.CST_ID, T1.CRV_ID, T1.CRD_ID, T1.OBG_ID, T1.CSP_NUMBER, T1.CPA_TYPE, T1.OTR_ID, T1.OTR_TYPE, T1.OTY_ID, T1.CREATED_TMST, T1.OB_TRN_AMT, T1.PGM_APPLD_TO, T1.APPL_TO_ORD_TYP_CD, T1.CT_ORD_APPLIED_TO, T1.PGM_ST_APPLD_TO, T1.AR_NUMBER, T2.CLT_IDENTIFIER, T7.CSP_SUP_NUMBER, T7.CPA_SUP_TYPE from CKT_CR_DETAIL T2 with(readuncommitted) join CKT_OB_TRN T7 with(readuncommitted) join CKT_COLLECTION T1 with(readuncommitted) on (T7.OTY_TYPE = T1.OTY_ID) and (T7.OB_TRN_TYP = T1.OTR_TYPE) and (T7.OB_TRN_ID = T1.OTR_ID) and (T7.CPA_TYPE = T1.CPA_TYPE) and (T7.CSP_NUMBER = T1.CSP_NUMBER) and (T7.OBG_GENERATED_ID = T1.OBG_ID) and (T1.PGM_APPLD_TO in ('AF', 'NA')) and (T1.APPL_TO_ORD_TYP_CD = 'K') and (T1.APPLIED_TO_CD in ('A', 'C')) and (T1.CREATED_TMST between cast(@timestamp1 as datetime2) and cast(@timestamp2 as datetime2)) and (T1.ADJ_IND = 'N') and ( (cast(@number as char(10)) = ' ') or (T7.CSP_NUMBER = @number) ) and (T7.CSP_NUMBER >= @cspNumber) on (T2.CRD_ID = T1.CRD_ID) and (T2.CRV_IDENTIFIER = T1.CRV_ID) and (T2.CST_IDENTIFIER = T1.CST_ID) and (T2.CRT_IDENTIFIER = T1.CRT_TYPE) order by T1.CSP_NUMBER

data.name: ReadCollectionType1
data.value: select top(1) COLLECTION_TYPE_ID from CKT_COLLTN_TYPE with(readuncommitted) where COLLECTION_TYPE_ID = @collectionTypeId

data.name: ReadCollectionType2
data.value: select COLLECTION_TYPE_ID, CASH_NON_CASH_IND from CKT_COLLTN_TYPE order by COLLECTION_TYPE_ID

data.name: ReadCsePerson1
data.value: select top(1) NUMB from CKT_CSE_PERSON where NUMB = @numb

data.name: ReadCsePerson2
data.value: select top(1) NUMB, TYPE from CKT_CSE_PERSON with(readuncommitted) where NUMB = @numb

data.name: ReadCsePerson3
data.value: select distinct T1.NUMB from CKT_CSE_PERSON T1 with(readuncommitted) join CKT_CSE_PERSON_ACC T2 with(readuncommitted) on T1.NUMB = T2.CSP_NUMBER join CKT_CASE_ROLE T3 with(readuncommitted) on T1.NUMB = T3.CSP_NUMBER join CKT_CASE_ROLE T5 with(readuncommitted) on (T3.CAS_NUMBER = T5.CAS_NUMBER) and (@cspNumber = T5.CSP_NUMBER) order by T1.NUMB
